short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple tool to help you easily add all those photo comments / memes by choosing from an online library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple tool to help you easily add all those photo comments / memes by choosing from an online library.

You can also contribute memes to our online library by uploading it here https://www.facebook.com/addphotocomments. After review we will publish it.
